channel.title: Game of Thrones Got on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel
channel.description: Recent content in Game of Thrones Got on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel

item.title: Scraping Game of Thrones Data
item.description: WARNING: This post contains spoilers for Game of Thrones and some foul language reproduced from the show script April may as well be Game of Thrones (GoT) month. For 7 loyal years, fans eagerly await April as the premiere of the new season. The final season is no different and will yet again return in April…2019. As a loyal fan I’m determined to not let my April 2018 be any different and am dedicating a few blog posts to GoT.
